content: Duchess Świętosława greets Duke Vratislav warmly and inquires about his day before expressing her regret for missing the city's festivities. She mentions her desire to support their people and land, showcasing her Cognizant trait. Later, when Duke Vratislav asks where they are, Duchess Świętosława kindly reminds him that they are in their private bedchamber, revealing her awareness (Cognizant) of their surroundings. Despite her generally warm demeanor, it is worth noting that she possesses Callous and Wrathful traits as well.
